item.description:
Please note: This Date is currently tentative. Will update as soon as the real date is known.

Wickham Park, Manchester CT (1329 West Middle Turnpike)

Our newest 5K â€“ the True Colors 5K is run through scenic Wickham Park in Manchester. The 2-loop course is a mixture of paved and dirt trails and open field running. Course design is similar to the certified course used for the annual Wickham Invitational, a regional cross country meet.

This event benefits: True Colors works toward creating a world where youth, adults and families of all sexual orientations and gender identities are valued and affirmed. We challenge all forms of oppression through education, training, advocacy, youth leadership development, mentoring and direct services to youth and those responsible for their well-being. Contact True Colors at 888-565-5551 or www.ourTrueColors.org.
item.name: True Colors 5K
